publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4794 Claire Baker: Congratulations to 1st Methil Girls’ Brigade—That the Parliament warmly congratulates the 1st Methil Girls’ Brigade on its diamond anniversary; congratulates past and present members on their many achievements with the 1st Methil Girls’ Brigade; recognises the hard work of the volunteers and parents who, over the last 60 years, have supported the activity of the 1st Methil Girls’ Brigade, and recognises the contribution that girls’ brigades across Scotland make to girls’ lives and their communities.

S3M-4794 Claire Baker: Congratulations to 1st Methil Girls’ Brigade—That the Parliament warmly congratulates the 1st Methil Girls’ Brigade on its diamond anniversary; congratulates past and present members on their many achievements with the 1st Methil Girls’ Brigade; recognises the hard work of the volunteers and parents who, over the last 60 years, have supported the activity of the 1st Methil Girls’ Brigade, and recognises the contribution that girls’ brigades across Scotland make to girls’ lives and their communities.
S3M-4794 Congratulations to 1st Methil Girls’ Brigade (lodged on 7 September 2009) Karen Whitefield*
S3M-4794 Congratulations to 1st Methil Girls’ Brigade (lodged on 7 September 2009) David Stewart*
